text: The AVN Award for Male Foreign Performer of the Year is an award that has been given annually by sex industry company AVN since the award's inception in 2003. First recipient of the award was Italian-born pornographic actor Rocco Siffredi who was awarded at 20th AVN Awards in 2003. As of 2019, eight pornographic actors have been awarded who are of six different nationalities: Italian (eight), French (three), German and British (two), Spanish and Scottish (one each). Italian pornographic actor Rocco Siffredi is the most honoured actor with eight awards followed by German pornographic actor Steve Holmes and British pornographic actor Danny D with two awards. Most recent winner of the award is Danny D, who was awarded at 37th AVN Awards in 2020. ==Overview== {|Class="wikitable" ! Performer country of origin !
